General.Name: Welgene Biotech Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Welgene Biotech Co.,Ltd. provides genetic testing services. The company offers research services, including sequencing, microarray, qPCR verification, nucleic acid extraction/QC, LCM single cell experiment, and bioinformatics analysis services; and Cytoscan, an array-based comparative genomic hybridization. It also provides reagents, consumable supplies, and instruments, as well as software services. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
